activity.title: Activity 1
activity.instructions: Read the Museum Guide. Click on the correct answer.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.reader: Guide to the World’s Great Museums National Palace Museum, Taipei The National Palace Museum is on Chih-shan Road in the Wai-shuang-hsi district of Taipei. Transportation: Take bus 213, 255, or 304, or take a taxi. National Museum of Anthropology, Mexico City The National Museum of Anthropology is in Mexico City. It is in Chapultepec Park, section 1. Transportation: Take a taxi or take the number 7 train to Auditorio metro station. Kyoto National Museum, Kyoto The Kyoto National Museum is at 527 Chayamachi, Higashiyama-ku. Transportation: Take the Japan Rail train to Kyoto Station. Then bus 206 or 208. Walk from the bus stop to the museum.
question.text: The National Museum of Anthropology is in _____.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

Transportation: Take the Japan Rail train to Kyoto Station. Then bus 206 or 208. Walk from the bus stop to the museum.
question.text: Take _____ to get to the Kyoto National Museum.
